Title: EC2.10 Amazon EC2 should be configured to use VPC endpoints that are created for the Amazon EC2 service
Description: This control checks whether a service endpoint for Amazon EC2 is created for each VPC. The control fails if a VPC does not have a VPC endpoint created for the Amazon EC2 service.

Title: PCI.IAM.6 MFA should be enabled for all IAM users
Description: This AWS control checks whether the AWS Identity and Access Management users have multi-factor authentication (MFA) enabled.
Standards: ['Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/PCI-DSS']
